description:
The first part of the episode has Arima and Yukino thinking about their insecurities. Arima still can`t move beyond his troubled past and Yukino feels gyped by her changed ways. Arima makes Asaba cry because he didn`t tell him that he and Yukino slept together. Part 2 of the episode is just a very brief recap of the series.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Different Story from So Far
Un épisode pas comme les autres (I)
